feed.title: GitHub Dart Monthly Trending

entry.title: samolego/Canta
entry.summary:
Uninstall any Android app without root (Shizuku)!

Canta

Uninstall any app without root! Powered by Shizuku.

Uses universal debloat list for badges. Please read the guide on how recommendations are chosen .

Note: Supports only Android >= 9.0 (SDK >= 28).

How-to

  • install Shizuku & activate it
    • you can follow this Android Police guide for more in-depth explanation
  • install Canta
  • select an app and click the trash button

Features

  • no bricking - if you remove essential app and get stuck in a bootloop after reboot - you will need to do factory reset, but that's it!
  • auto detect previously uninstalled apps if you've already removed any using adb

Screenshots

Thanks

  • Icon created on icon kitchen
  • @RikkaApps for Shizuku

entry.title: ReVanced/revanced-manager
entry.summary:
üíä Application to use ReVanced on Android


                       

Continuing the legacy of Vanced

üíä ReVanced Manager

Application to use ReVanced on Android

‚ùì About

ReVanced Manager is an application that uses ReVanced Patcher to patch Android apps.

üí™ Features

Some of the features ReVanced Manager provides are:

  • üíâ Patch apps: Apply any patch of your choice to Android apps
  • üì± Portable: ReVanced Patcher that fits in your pocket
  • ü§ó Simple UI: Quickly understand the ins and outs of ReVanced Manager
  • üõ†Ô∏è Customization: Configurable API, custom sources, language, signing keystore, theme and more

üîΩ Download

You can download the most recent version of ReVanced Manager at revanced.app/download or from GitHub releases.
Learn how to use ReVanced Manager by following the documentation.

üìö Everything else

üìô Contributing

Thank you for considering contributing to ReVanced Manager. You can find the contribution guidelines here.

üõ†Ô∏è Building

To build a ReVanced Manager, you can follow the documentation.

üìÑ Documentation

You can find the documentation for ReVanced Manager here.

üëã Contributing

Thank you for considering contributing to ReVanced Manager. You can find the contribution guidelines here.

‚öñÔ∏è License

ReVanced Manager is licensed under the GPLv3 license. Please see the license file for more information. tl;dr you may copy, distribute and modify ReVanced Manager as long as you track changes/dates in source files. Any modifications to ReVanced Manager must also be made available under the GPL, along with build & install instructions.

entry.title: mulaRahul/keyviz
entry.summary:
Keyviz is a free and open-source tool to visualize your keystrokes ‚å®Ô∏è and üñ±Ô∏è mouse actions in real-time.

Keyviz is a free and open-source software to visualise your keystrokes and mouse actions in real time! Let your audience know what handy shortcuts/keys you're pressing during screencasts, presentations, collaborations, or whenever you need it.

English | ÁÆÄ‰Ωì‰∏≠Êñá

‚å®Ô∏è Keystrokes & üñ±Ô∏è Mouse Actions

Now you can visualize mouse actions! Not only mouse clicks, you can also visualize mouse actions along with keystrokes like Cmd + Click, Alt + Drag, etc.

üé® Stylize

Don't restrain yourself to just black & white! You can customize every aspect of the visualization. The visualisation's style, size, colour (modifier and regular keys), border, icon, etc.

Powerful and easy-to-use configuration options.

  • Filter normal keys and only display shortcuts like Cmd + K (Default)
  • Adjust the visualisation position on the screen
  • Decide how much the visualisation lingers on the screen before animating out
  • Switch between animation presets to animate your visualisation in & out

üì• Installation

You can download the latest version of keyviz from the Github Releases page. For the installer, unzip the downloaded file, run the installer and follow the familiar steps to install keyviz.

ü•Ñ Scoop 
scoop bucket add extras # first, add the bucket
scoop install keyviz
ü™ü Winget 
winget install mulaRahul.Keyviz

*.dll missing error?

If you're getting a .dll missing error after installing the application, you're missing the required Visual C++ redistributables. You can get the same from here VSC++ Redist.


üõ†Ô∏è Build Instructions

You can always further develop/build the project by yourself. First of all ensure that you've setup Flutter on your system. If not follow this guide.

After setting up flutter, clone the repository or download the zip and unpack the same.

mkdir keyviz
git clone https://github.com/mulaRahul/keyviz.git .

Move inside the flutter project and run the build command to create an executable -

cd keyviz
# get required dependencies
flutter pub get
# build executable
flutter build windows

üíñ Support

As keyviz is freeware, the only way I can earn is through your generous donations. It helps free my time and work more on keyviz.
